instructions:
Cut flank steak across grain into 1/2 pound pieces and pound to 3/8 inch thickness. Mix crumbs, cheese
and seasonings and spread evenly over pieces of steak leaving a 3/4 inch border. Roll such that grain runs
lengthwise and tie with twine. In a frying pan sear the meat rolls in hot oil until brown on all sides. Place in
covered oven proof dish and spoon Creole sauce over meat. Cover and place in 325 F oven for about 1 1/2
hours or until meat is tender. Cut across grain in 1 inch slices and serve with sauce. Serves 4.
name: Braciole
